attributes.action: END THE POSTCODE LOTTERY FOR IVF TREATMENT!
attributes.additional_details: Nice recommends that all women under 40 should be offered 3 rounds of nhs funded ivf! The government has now ignored that advice not accepting infertility as a major problem! Infertility is a terrible thing to suffer from and the government should step in immediately! Nice recommendations should not be ignored I ask you to attend this assisted conception unit so you can see first hand the devastation of the women who fail and have no other cycles left! We should all be equal as UK citizens!
attributes.background: I am 31 years old, I have no children and we have been trying for a baby for years I was devastated to learn that if I lived in another area I could have 2 cycles of nhs funded ivf but because I live in Sheffield I am only entitled to one! Mr Cameron I ask you if you think this is fair?!
